name: African International Institute for Peace
goal:
It works in the field of capacity building through training and workshops in
peace and development , legal consultation and election monitoring , human rights, democracy and the culture of peace as well as supporting the cultural of dialogue and act a mediator for conflict resolution through conferences and discussions to
expand its services beyond the Institute
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
training and workshops in peace and development , legal consultation and election monitoring , human rights, democracy and the culture of peace as well as supporting the cultural of dialogue and act a mediator for conflict resolution through conferences and discussions to
expand
